subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Anther hack? [1 Attachment]

full_text:

Frank,
I have meaning to ask you what you thought of the other inventors
th=
at were on the Queen Mary with you?
Were there some good ideas, or did you =
think they were full of crap ?
 Was there anyone you were a little impresse=
d with?
Your probably the only person that would be honest about it.....
 
=
Deb Fransen

________________________________

From: EVP-ITC@...=
m [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf
Of Frank Sumption
Sent: Thursd=
ay, September 24, 2009 2:56 PM
To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.com; grassharp@yahoo=
groups.com
Subject: [EVP-ITC] Anther hack? [1 Attachment]


  
[Attachment(=
s) from Frank Sumption included below] 



 Picked up another RCA alarm clo=
ck radio yesterday for $3. It's
hackable, although I'll convert it to a box=
 tuner by removing the
processor board. Cost is the motivator, this tuner i=
s $3, ---for the TRF
box, just the tuning diodes are $6, the TRF chip $1.50=
( i think), the
pcb board $20, plus maybe $20 for the rest of the parts, an=
d that's not
including assembly. Trouble is, I can't find a ready supply of=
 re-usable
tuners. This sounds alot better after it's converted. 
 
 frank-=
S
